snippet: The Blackstone Group on Thursday reported a 74 percent decline in second-quarter earnings, underscoring some of the challenges the private equity industry faces.
abstract: The Blackstone Group on Thursday reported a 74 percent decline in second-quarter earnings, underscoring some of the challenges the private equity industry faces.

headline.main: Blackstone Profit Fell 74% in Second Quarter
headline.print_headline: Blackstone’s Profit Fell 74% in 2nd Quarter, but Investors Continued to Commit Money
